shapecode_1_g=1.000
shapecode_1_b=1.000

shapecode_1_border_g=1.000

shapecode_2_textured=1

shapecode_2_x=0.463
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=1.60089
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=0.67634
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=1.000
shapecode_2_b=1.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000

shapecode_2_border_g=1.000

shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=16
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=353
shapecode_3_x=0.503
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.03760
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.11234
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=1.000
shapecode_3_b=1.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=0.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=sample=instance/num_inst;
shape_3_per_frame2=rad=.05+.04*sin(sample);
shape_3_per_frame3=
shape_3_per_frame4=/////  Knot
shape_3_per_frame5=
shape_3_per_frame6=q10=250*sample;
shape_3_per_frame7=my_x = -.22*cos(q10)-1.28*sin(q10)-.44*cos(3*q10)-.78*sin(3*q10);
shape_3_per_frame8=my_y= -.1*cos(2*q10)-.27*sin(2*q10)+.38*cos(4*q10)+.46*sin(4*q10);
shape_3_per_frame9=my_z=.7*cos(3*q10)-.4*sin(3*q10);
shape_3_per_frame10=
shape_3_per_frame11=
shape_3_per_frame12=/////// rotations... by flexi
shape_3_per_frame13=
shape_3_per_frame14=d = .2; 
shape_3_per_frame15=zoom = 1;
shape_3_per_frame16=
shape_3_per_frame17=w3 = q1;
shape_3_per_frame18=w2 = q2;
shape_3_per_frame19=w1 = q3;
shape_3_per_frame20=
shape_3_per_frame21=x1 = cos(w1)*my_x + sin(w1)*my_y;
shape_3_per_frame22=y1 = -sin(w1)*my_x + cos(w1)*my_y;
shape_3_per_frame23=z1 = my_z;
shape_3_per_frame24=
shape_3_per_frame25=x2 = cos(w2)*x1 + sin(w2)*z1;
shape_3_per_frame26=z2 = -sin(w2)*x1 + cos(w2)*z1;
shape_3_per_frame27=y2 = y1;
shape_3_per_frame28=
shape_3_per_frame29=y3 = cos(w3)*y2 + sin(w3)*z2;
shape_3_per_frame30=z3 = -sin(w3)*y2 + cos(w3)*z2;
shape_3_per_frame31=x3 = x2;
shape_3_per_frame32=
shape_3_per_frame33=// perspective calculation
shape_3_per_frame34=
shape_3_per_frame35=l = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3);
shape_3_per_frame36=w = atan2(x3,y3);
shape_3_per_frame37=p = tan(asin(1) + atan2(d+z3,l));
shape_3_per_frame38=d = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3 + (z3+d)*(z3+d));
shape_3_per_frame39=
shape_3_per_frame40=my_x = zoom*sin(w)*p;
shape_3_per_frame41=my_y = zoom*cos(w)*p;
shape_3_per_frame42=
shape_3_per_frame43=p1 = .2*sin(sample*50);
shape_3_per_frame44=p2 = .2*sin(sample*80);
shape_3_per_frame45=
shape_3_per_frame46=x = .5+my_x*p1;
shape_3_per_frame47=y = .5+my_y*p2;
shape_3_per_frame48=
shape_3_per_frame49=r = .4*sin(sample*80);
shape_3_per_frame50=b = .8*sin(sample*66);
shape_3_per_frame51=g = .6*sin(sample*120);
per_frame_1=//begin beat code
per_frame_2=volume = 0.3*(bass+mid);
per_frame_3=beatrate = equal(beatrate,0) + (1-equal(beatrate,0))*(below(volume,0.01) + (1-below(volume,0.01))*beatrate);
per_frame_4=lastbeat = lastbeat + equal(lastbeat,0)*time;
per_frame_5=meanbass_att = 0.05*(meanbass_att*19 + bass_att);
per_frame_6=peakbass_att = max(bass_att,peakbass_att);
per_frame_7=beat = above(volume,0.8)*below(peakbass_att - bass_att, 0.05*peakbass_att)*above(time - lastbeat, 0.1 + 0.5*(beatrate - 0.1));
per_frame_8=beatrate = max(if(beat,if(below(time-lastbeat,2*beatrate),0.1*(beatrate*9 + time - lastbeat),beatrate),beatrate),0.1);
per_frame_9=//Adjust responsiveness: To increase responsiveness, set the "0.96 and "0.996" on the next line to slightly lower values. Higher values decrease responsiveness.
per_frame_10=peakbass_att = beat*bass_att + (1-beat)*peakbass_att*(above(time - lastbeat, 2*beatrate)*0.96 + (1-above(time - lastbeat, 2*beatrate))*0.996);
per_frame_11=lastbeat = beat*time + (1-beat)*lastbeat;
per_frame_12=peakbass_att = max(peakbass_att,1.1*meanbass_att);
per_frame_13=//end beat code
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=q10 = beat;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=//zoom = 1.0;
per_frame_18=decay = 1;
per_frame_19=//warp = 0;
per_frame_20=wave_a = 0;
per_frame_21=
per_frame_22=tic = min(time-tin,.1);
per_frame_23=tin = time;
per_frame_24=
per_frame_25=an = an + tic*bass*bass*.5;
per_frame_26=q1 = sin(an);
per_frame_27=q2 = cos(an);
per_frame_28=
per_frame_29=an2 = an2 - tic*mid*mid*.4;
per_frame_30=q3 = sin(an2);
per_frame_31=q4 = cos(an2);
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=
per_frame_34=an3 = an3 - tic*treb*treb*.4;
per_frame_35=q5 = sin(an3);
per_frame_36=q6 = cos(an3);
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.00+0.5 ).x;
warp_4=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.98+0.5 ).y;
warp_5=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_8=`                      ).xyz*
warp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_11=`                     );
warp_12=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_13=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_14=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_15=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.95+0.5 ).z;
warp_16=`    
warp_17=`    // .x = fastest layer, .z = slowest
warp_18=`    // slowly shift stuff toward the front, over time:
warp_19=`    ret += float3(-ret.x,ret.x-ret.y,ret.y-ret.z)*0.03, (bass_att-1)*0.1;
warp_20=`     
warp_21=`    // ERROR DIFFUSION DITHER - looks great
warp_22=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_23=`    ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0*3;
warp_24=`
warp_25=`    // darken over time
warp_26=`    ret *= .8+(max(mid,treb)*.1);
warp_27=`   
warp_28=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`float2 uvm = uv;
comp_5=`ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uvm).x,
comp_6=`
comp_7=`ret = lerp (
comp_8=`GetBlur1(uvm).x + GetBlur3(uvm).x,
comp_9=`ret,
comp_10=`pow(ret,.5));
comp_11=`
comp_12=`
comp_13=`float2 uv3 = (uv-.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uvm).zzz)+.5;
comp_14=`
comp_15=`ret += saturate(pow(tex2D(sampler_main, uv3).zzz,.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uvm).x -ret.x)),
comp_16=`ret += saturate(pow(GetBlur1(uv3).zzz,.5)*(1-GetBlur1(uvm).x -ret.x)),
comp_17=`  
comp_18=`//ret = pow(ret,float3(3,.95,.6))*1.25 -.25;
comp_19=`ret -= tex2D(sampler_main, uvm).yyy,
comp_20=`ret *= ret;
comp_21=` 
comp_22=`ret = lerp (
comp_23=`ret,
comp_24=`ret,
comp_25=`0);
comp_26=`
comp_27=`
comp_28=`ret = pow(ret,float3(.5,1,2));
comp_29=`ret *= ret;
comp_30=`ret += tex2D(sampler_main, uvm).yyy*2,
comp_31=`
comp_32=`}
